name: Flip-Flop!
description:
Welcome to your new internship at the Matching Factorytm. Your new friends Q and E will guide you through this match-3 puzzle game. Help them get through four hard shifts, or relax and enjoy yourself with the freeplay mode

Controls: 
W and S : Move the cursor up and down the puzzle

Q and E : Rotate the puzzle

F: Use the bomb power when the meter is full.

This project was created as part of the Kenney Jam 2021. The theme of the jam was Rotation

You can view the source code of the project here. You can also witness the loss of my sanity as I'm trying to traverse through a rotating array in script!
